medical_history.chief_complaint: The patient presented with a diagnosis of diabetes associated with genetic variants.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Four cases of diabetes were examined, showing varied onset ages and histories. The case histories included a 40-year-old male with a 28-year history of insulin-dependent diabetes, a 45-year-old male with a 20-year duration, a 19-year-old female with a 3-year history, and a 26-year-old female with a 15-year history of insulin-dependent diabetes.
medical_history.past_medical_history: One patient had a history of several complications including hypertension, peripheral vascular disease, diabetic retinopathy, diabetic nephropathy, and a prior myocardial infarction. Another had a history of diabetic ketoacidosis, acute renal failure, and drug abuse.
medical_history.family_history: One case noted a family history of type 2 diabetes.
medical_history.social_history: One patient had a history of drug abuse, and others had varying degrees of lifestyle factors, including obesity.
